text: “Kodi sudamve (nkhani za) amene adatuluka m’nyumba zawo ali zikwizikwi kuopa imfa? Ndipo Allah adawauza: “Mwalirani,” (ndipo adamwalira chabe popanda chifukwa chilichonse). Kenako Adawaukitsa (kuti adziwe kuti imfa njosathawika). Ndithudi, Allah Ndimwini kuchita zabwino pa anthu, koma anthu ambiri sathokoza
